snippet.title: SlenderMan Mobile Game | Lost Children | Official Trailer | iOS
snippet.description:
#SlenderManMobileGame: 

Our first mobile first person game (and more adult themed - jump scares! eek!) has you searching for your son who was taken by a mysterious entity to the woods. Explore the expansive environment in the dark with nothing but your flashlight, map and wits to find your son through various clues. But lurking silently in the darkness is Slenderman, who wants to claim you as well.

This game quickly rose the charts as one of the more polished, refined and fun Slenderman horror games at the time. We were pleasantly surprised at the passion shown for the game in reviews and it’s cult-like fanbase.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Who Are We? #RedPistonInc

Why do Fortune 500 brands trust us with their customers and their money? Because we get it. We live and breathe digital and constantly push limits of technology and creativity. We’re good at what we do and would love to show you what we can do for you.

We provide custom creative solutions to big problems by using our expertise in various technologies. Check out just a few areas we excel at, and the work we’ve done below. As they say, the proof is in the pudding!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Want to work with us? Contact us today:
